name: astro
description: Astro is a modern static site generator for building fast, content-driven websites.

version.description: Version of astro to install from GitHub releases.

skipProjectCreation.description: Skip automatic project creation (only install Astro CLI globally)

installGlobally.description: Install Astro CLI globally in addition to project creation

project.description: The name of the Astro project folder to create. This is only used if project creation is not skipped.

template.description: The Astro project template to use. See https://github.com/withastro/astro/tree/main/examples for available templates. This is only used if project creation is not skipped.

integrations.description: A space separated list of Astro integrations to add to the project. See https://docs.astro.build/en/guides/integrations-guide/ for integrations. This is only used if project creation is not skipped.
